SWACHHATA HI SEVA

Plastic Waste Free Campaign

THE TEAM

01

AIM

To provide hands on experience to our students in delivering community service.

02

MOTTO

NOT ME BUT YOU

03

FUNCTIONALITY

NSS unit of IIIT Raichur started functioning from the founding year of institute,i.e., 2019.

UpdatesFew glimpes of the previous events

17 Oct 2019

Swachhata hi seva

On 17th of october, 2019.The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in an event “Swachhata hi seva” conducted by NSS IITH, in the hostel premises of IIT Hyderabad.

01 Feb 2020

Plantation Drive

On 1st February 2020,Green office of IITH has organised plantation, to which NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has also volunteered.

11 Nov 2020

National Education Day

On 11th of November, 2020. To commemorate the birth anniversary of Maulana Abul Kalam Azad, we have organized a few online events, to generate awareness on the importance of Education.

26 Nov 2020

Constitution Day

On 26th of November, 2020. We have organized a webinar on Indian Constitution Preamble and a few online events.

09 Dec 2020

Drug Abuse-Awareness & Prevention

On 9th of December, 2020. We have organized an online event “Drug abuse-Awareness and Prevention”.

03 Feb 2021

Road Safety

During the Road safety week, We have organized an online event “Road Safety” to create awareness about how cautious we shall be while we are driving, riding or even walking.

18 Apr 2021

Elimination of Single use of Plastic

On 18th of April, 2021. We have organized an online event “Elimination of Single use of Plastic”, to create awareness about how necessity it is to eliminate the plastic use.

21 Apr 2021

Act wise, Save Life

On 21st of April, 2021. Volunteers have participated in the online event “Act wise, Save Life”, Where volunteers are encouraged to make a flowchart of steps involved in the first aid treatment.

01 May 2021

May Day

On 1st of May, 2021. The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in the online event “May Day”, a day to tribute to the contribution of workers all over India. Organised events such as video making, poster making and infographics.

Coordinators The leaders who makes all this possible
